commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Mmm, we really played our hearts out.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: From the flag lifting game to playing house to racing trains around the tracks we built.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: And after taking a break, we played robots, racecar races, ball-toss, whack-a-mole, and building blocks... There isn't a single toy in this play space we didn't use.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: These girls look like they're tired of everything, too.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I suppose there's only one thing to do. It's time for me to sing a song--

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hey, girls! I think you were just mer-made for this mermaid doll here!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: How about wishing upon a starfish plush?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hope you're not TIRE-d of this racecar here!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Ai! What are you doing now?!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Whoa! You! Great timing, hold this a sec!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Huh?!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: It's a yo-yo! Girls, don't you think it's funny that You has a yo-yo... yo?!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Ai, your puns are...a hit with the girls!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: They really are. Look, their eyes are positively sparkling! She's totally their hero now.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: *Giggle* That's Ai for you. She's so good at capturing the hearts of everyone she interacts with.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I guess it's because she knows how to appeal to what they want from her?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hey! I'm a school idol, too, I can't lose out to her in that respect!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Girls, this is no time to play around! I've got the toys, so you'll have to catch me first if you want 'em!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Come on, all of you hurry up and grab a toy.

commands.speaker: Nico, Hanayo, Dia, You, Karin
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Oh no! Look, everyone has a toy now! You'd better hurry up and chase us!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: What? Now we're playing tag? I suppose we are!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Ahaha! You can't catch me that easily!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: I-I'm almost out of energy!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Just a little longer, Hanayo! We've gotta keep them smiling!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: I-I'll do my best!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hey! What about my song?!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Everyone, you saved the day today!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: In the end, all we did was take care of those two little girls. Was that really enough?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Of course. They went home grinning ear to ear, and that last game of tag involved all the kids in the store. It was really fun.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: But it was Ai's puns that really got everyone having a good time.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hehehehe! I'm just glad I could be of service!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I really never thought Ai's puns would be that much of a hit with the kids.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hey! My puns are great!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Putting aside the quality of the puns, it's a fact that everyone had a good time all thanks to them.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: I want to learn how you think on your feet like that.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I'm not sure I'm that good at thinking on my feet, but I'll teach you the way of the pun any day!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Perhaps I'll join that course.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Okay. Then starting now, today is Ai's special master class in punnery!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Until you go home, you're all not allowed to speak in anything but puns!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hold it! We're already too exhausted today!
